Tool

NameExport Grid to XYZ
ID5
AuthorO. Conrad (c) 2003
Specificationgrid

Description

Export grid to a table (text format), that contains for each grid cell the x/y-coordinates and additionally data from selected grids. Optionally, it is possible to skip NoData cells from the output. In this case, the first input grid will perform like a mask.

Parameters

NameTypeIdentifierDescriptionConstraints
Input
Grids Grid list (input)GRIDS
Options
File NameFile pathFILENAME
Write Field NamesBooleanCAPTIONDefault: 1
Exclude NoData CellsBooleanEX_NODATADefault: 0
